unnormalised: Property prices in Mumbaiâ€™s prime locations have seen a surge, according to a recent report. A 2BHK flat at 15, Carter Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai, 400050, recently sold for a record Rs. 8.5 crore. Brokers attribute the price hike to increased demand from NRIs and high-net-worth individuals.
normalised: Property prices in Mumbai's prime locations have seen a surge, according to a recent report. A two B H K flat at fifteen, Carter Road, Bandra (W), Mumbai, four hundred thousand and fifty, recently sold for a record rupee eight point five crore. Brokers attribute the price hike to increased demand from N-R-Is and high-net-worth individuals.

unnormalised: The trend isn't limited to Bandra. In South Mumbai, a sea-facing apartment at Cuffe Parade, specifically at 21, Maker Tower, Cuffe Parade, Mumbai, 400005, went for Rs. 12 crore. Real estate analysts predict further appreciation, especially in properties near the Bandra-Worli Sea Link and along Marine Drive. They also note that the area around 1, Carmichael Road, Mumbai, 400026 is seeing renewed interest.
normalised: The trend isn't limited to Bandra. In South Mumbai, a sea-facing apartment at Cuffe Parade, specifically at twenty one, Maker Tower, Cuffe Parade, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and five, went for rupee twelve crore. Real estate analysts predict further appreciation, especially in properties near the Bandra-Worli Sea Link and along Marine Drive. They also note that the area around one, Carmichael Road, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and twenty six is seeing renewed interest.

unnormalised: Experts advise potential buyers to carefully evaluate property documents and verify the legal status of the land before investing. They also emphasize the importance of checking the RERA registration for any new projects, especially in areas like Sector 18, Kharghar, Navi Mumbai, 410210, where numerous developments are underway.
normalised: Experts advise potential buyers to carefully evaluate property documents and verify the legal status of the land before investing. They also emphasize the importance of checking the R-E-R-A registration for any new projects, especially in areas like Sector eighteen, Kharghar, Navi Mumbai, four hundred and ten thousand two hundred and ten, where numerous developments are underway.
